attributes.action: force supermarkets to make ALL packaging 100% recyclable or biodegradable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many items such as yogurts, butter and crisps all come in containers which are not currently recyclable, it should be made the responsibility of the seller to ensure that all packaging can be recycled in the council in which that store is located, thus eliminating a huge proportion of our annual unrecycled waste.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
